Update the attached providerConfigs.js file with the latest AI models and current API pricing information.

Requirements:
- Keep the exact same JavaScript structure and module.exports format
- Update CONFIG_VERSION to today's date in DDMMYY format
- Research and update to the newest available models for each provider
- Update pricing information to current rates
- Include all providers: Claude, ChatGPT, Gemini, Groq, Mistral, Perplexity, Cohere

Return ONLY the complete updated JavaScript file content with no additional explanation.
